data.title: Hytera SmartOne Radio Dispatch Platform
data.meta_description: SmartOne is a comprehensive unified communication and dispatching platform that enables the integration of different radio networks with one application.
data.text:
SmartOne is a comprehensive unified communication and dispatching platform that enables the integration of different radio networks with one intuitive application. SmartOne supports dispatching, voice

recording, and camera monitoring, all with one intelligent and intuitive user interface. Single or multi-client, SmartOne is the ideal choice to deliver unified communications and realize the potential of your radio network.

SmartOne enables dispatching calls across analog, DMR, Push-to-Talk over Cellular, and third-party radio networks.

SmartOne offers powerful dispatching functions, such as voice calls, GPS positioning services, messaging functions and voice recording. The software can also be expanded by a series of plugins for displaying IP-connected cameras, and it is possible to integrate browser-based big data or analytics web content.
